node.title: 13-Year-Old Girl Among Latest Deaths Reported From Protests Against Sudan Military Coup
node.description: The latest deaths include Remaaz Hatim al-atta and Omar Adam, bringing the death toll from Saturday's protests to 7. At least 23 protestors have died overall.

node.title: While Many Unions Work to Undermine Biden's Vaccine Mandate, Some Are Suing to Widen Them
node.description: "The COVID vaccine or test mandate should be broader in scope to also apply to employers with less than 100 employees," a union leader said.

node.title: Inflation surge is gobbling up many Americans' pay raises
node.description: Worker pay has increased almost 5% during the past year. Yet after the impact of inflation, real wages are down 1.2%.

node.title: Gang of Jewel Thieves That Robbed Wealthy Sentenced for Multimillion-Dollar Heists

node.title: West Virginia Becomes Fourth State to Allow All Adults to Get COVID Booster Shots

node.title: 800 homes in Forbes could be evacuated as flood levels continue to rise

node.title: Blue Wiggle Anthony Field donates ARIA-nominated album to late veteran's family
node.description: Anthony Field says Brendan Nikolajew was a remarkable friend who taught him "how to live" and "how to die". Now the soldier and father of two is up for the most presitgious of Australian music awards.

node.title: Stay up to date with all the COVID-19 news in our live blog

node.title: Democrats Still Don’t Understand Asian American Voters

node.title: In the Fight Against Climate Change, Young Voices Speak Out

node.title: Rittenhouse Prosecutor Argues Teen Lied About Shooting, Being an EMT to 'Save His Own Skin'

node.title: Smithfield Settles With OSHA Over Citation for Company's COVID Safety Measures

node.title: Steve Bannon Says 'We're Going on the Offense' Against Jan. 6 Committee as Arraignment Looms
node.description: Bannon's lawyer said, "What [Bannon] means by offense is we're gonna challenge this affirmatively. We're gonna fight to defend his rights."

node.title: Race against time: The Torres Strait Islanders battling vaccine misinformation to save communities
node.description: With just a month left before Queensland borders open, community leaders in Cape York and the Torres Strait are fighting both a pandemic and a torrent of misinformation.

node.title: Queensland's impending restrictions for the unvaccinated saw a boost in people taking up the jab, but will it last?

node.title: Third dose of Pfizer vaccine 'lifts level of immunity', says immunologist

node.title: Regulator to be questioned at inquest into fatal helicopter crash
node.description: Did the country's aviation regulator do enough to prevent one of this country's worst helicopter crashes from happening, and have changes been made to stop one happening again?

node.title: Isolation period for fully vaccinated Covid-19 cases changes
node.description: Covid-19 cases who have had two vaccine doses will only have to isolate for 10 days, while the unvaccinated still have to isolate for 14 days.

node.title: Blinken Heads to Africa as U.S. Tries to Avert Ethiopia Disaster

node.title: Cuba Crushes Dissent Ahead of Protest

node.title: Unvaccinated Mom 'Grateful to Be Here' After Emergency Delivery, COVID Hospitalization

node.title: Mother Claims Waffle House Employees Joked About Grabbing Noose in Viral Video

node.title: UK counter-terrorism police arrest three after car blast

node.title: Salami snacks now linked to 31 salmonella illnesses in 10 states

node.title: How to Make Your Thanksgiving Dinner Less Boring

node.title: Washington Seeks $38B From Opioid Distributors After 8,000 Deaths Over 11 Years

node.title: Biden Signs Executive Order Targeted at Curbing Human Trafficking, Crime on Native Lands
node.description: The Justice, Homeland Security, and Interior Departments will work to grow participation in Amber Alert programs and training programs for federal agents.

node.title: Former Worker Claims He and 17 Other Wendy's Employees Quit in One Day in Viral TikTok
node.description: The TikToker alleged that he did not receive support and worked more than 80 hours each week without any days off.

node.title: After 'Miss M Roberts' sat for an Archibald portrait almost 90 years ago, her story was forgotten — until recently

node.title: Alan Paller, a Mover on Cybersecurity Threat, Is Dead at 76

node.title: An empowered I.R.S. emerges as the linchpin of Biden’s social policy bill.

node.title: Trial for Man Accused of Stalking, Killing and Robbing in 18 Murders Gets Underway

node.title: Metal Band Frontwoman Urinated on Fan During Music Festival Set

node.title: What does a sperm donor shortage mean for children not yet born?
node.description: More and more couples are turning to IVF to have children, prompting a surge in demand for donor sperm. New mum Lauren Burns says there’s another side to the baby boom that leaves donor-conceived people desperate to know their biological background.

node.title: Whangārei Hospital: Leaky roofs, dodgy lifts, waiting lists and Covid-19’s here
node.description: Covid-19 has locked down parts of Northland, but if the virus rips through how will Whangārei Hospital cope when the battered building can't even stand up to heavy rain?
